name: Dropcontact Tool
semantic_context: Find B2B emails and enrich contacts
natural_language_description: 这是 Dropcontact Tool 节点。主要用于: Find B2B emails and enrich contacts

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Find B2B emails and enrich contacts
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Find B2B emails and enrich contacts | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: enrich | (必填项)
available_options: Enrich (值: enrich) - Find B2B emails and enrich your contact from his name and his website

requestId.name: requestId
requestId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request ID | (必填项)

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: When off, waits for the contact data before completing. Waiting time can be adjusted with Extend Wait Time option. When on, returns a request_id that can be used later in the Fetch Request operation.
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output (Faster) | 作用: When off, waits for the contact data before completing. Waiting time can be adjusted with Extend Wait Time option. When on, returns a request_id that can be used later in the Fetch Request operation. | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: waitTime (值: None) - When not simplifying the response, data will be fetched in two steps. This parameter controls how long to wait (in seconds) before trying the second step.
siren (值: None) - Whether you want the SIREN number, NAF code, TVA number, company address and informations about the company leader. Only applies to french companies.
language (值: None) - Whether the response is in English or French
